"use strict";
const interaction_model_1 = require("../alexa/interaction-model");
const alexa_1 = require("../alexa/alexa");
const DefaultIntentSchemaLocation = "speechAssets/IntentSchema.json";
const DefaultSampleUtterancesLocation = "speechAssets/SampleUtterances.txt";
class BSTSpeak {
    constructor(skillURL, intentSchemaFile, sampleUtterancesFile, applicationID) {
        this.skillURL = skillURL;
        this.intentSchemaFile = intentSchemaFile;
        this.sampleUtterancesFile = sampleUtterancesFile;
        this.applicationID = applicationID;
        this._alexa = null;
        if (this.intentSchemaFile === undefined || this.intentSchemaFile === null) {
            this.intentSchemaFile = DefaultIntentSchemaLocation;
        }
        if (this.sampleUtterancesFile === undefined || this.sampleUtterancesFile === null) {
            this.sampleUtterancesFile = DefaultSampleUtterancesLocation;
        }
        this._alexa = new alexa_1.Alexa();
    }
    initialize(ready) {
        let self = this;
        interaction_model_1.InteractionModel.fromFiles(this.intentSchemaFile, this.sampleUtterancesFile, function (model, error) {
            if (error !== undefined && error !== null) {
                ready(error);
            }
            else {
                self._alexa.startSession(self.skillURL, model, true, self.applicationID);
                ready();
            }
        });
    }
    onSkillResponse(callback) {
        this._alexa.onSkillResponse(callback);
    }
    spoken(phrase, callback) {
        this._alexa.spoken(phrase, function (request, response, error) {
            callback(request, response, error);
        });
    }
    intended(intentName, slots, callback) {
        this._alexa.intended(intentName, slots, function (request, response, error) {
            callback(request, response, error);
        });
    }
    shutdown(onShutdown) {
        this._alexa.shutdown(onShutdown);
    }
}
exports.BSTSpeak = BSTSpeak;
//# sourceMappingURL=bst-speak.js.map
